title: 'No camping, parties, picnics': Fines for gatherings over 10 as coronavirus ban tightens
description: Tasmania's Premier has warned the public they face fines of up to $16,800 if they gather in groups larger than 10 people in public or private, from 6:00pm tonight.
content:
Updated 
March 27, 2020 17:00:52
Tasmania's Premier has warned the public they face fines of up to $16,800 if they gather in groups larger than 10 people in public or private from 6:00pm on Friday night, as part of the tightening of measures to address the … [+4385 chars]
